About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

Jeff is an academic and self-educated computer programmer, majoring in Computer Science at Florida State University. He graduates May 2020. His skills include:
Java, C#, SQL, C++/C, Python, MVC ASP.NET, JavaScript/jQuery, HTML/Bootstrap, Swift, Git, NPM, Android Development

FSU International Programs

Senior Developer
August 2019 - Present

Build out and maintain FSU IP website, student portal, student application, and database. Using C#, MVC ASP.NET, Bootstrap, jQuery, SQL Server, Visual Studio. Training incoming developers.

Raymond James

Developer Summer Intern
May 2019 - August 2019

Developer position within the IT Wealth Management department. Java, SQL, IntelliJ IDE, Git, Azure DevOps. Improved error finding efficiency by developing an automated email system that emails the details of error. Fixed 4 different bugs on RJ’s main Financial Advisor-facing application.

Keller Williams Realty

REALTOR®
May 2018 - Present

Coordinated numerous real estate transactions, representing the buyer's side. Jeff was a member of a top-producing real estate team, North Florida Moves Team at Keller Williams. Requires strong people skills and working knowledge of markets. Closed on 4 homes in a span of 9 months.
